channel.title: How do you make a prayer command?
channel.description:
Ive been wondering ive tried and tried, and no way to do..Does anyone know how?
([make a prayer command)]

or just put

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("prayer") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(486000000, 5); }

item.title: How do you make a prayer command?
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

Um ok here.

Search for if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) In you client.java and then you should see this.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSummonXP(886000000); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("YOU B MAXED OUT LIKE A BITCH!!! (go own some noobs)."); }

or something like that, then after the } add this

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“prayer”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
addSkillXP(486000000, 5);
addSkillXP(486000000, 6);
addSkillXP(486000000, 7);

}[/code]

Then close and save and then compile then your done. Then you can try it out.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a prayer command?
